txt.en: The lands of Evendim -- once the capital of the North Kingdom of Arnor -- have long lay uninhabited by Men, besides small bands of scavengers and robbers who pick through the ancient ruins and tombs that lie along the edge of the great lake.\n\nAs the forces of the North are aroused for war, those who gain control over this ancient seat of power may gain a critical advantage in the conflict to come.
While there are few who live within the lands of Evendim in this Age, the Rangers of the North hold the land sacred and may look kindly upon you for the aid you have lent them in its defence.
